property.name: message
property.value: string:Welcome to Mission Turtle: The Rescue, the first release in a series of fun top-down strategic games that require your strongest wits to reach the exit. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to rescue the turtle from its hostile environment and lead it to safety. You will have to use your best wits to avoid being snacked or overrun by your opponents! Let's go! Continue forward.

property.name: message
property.value: string:You have reached the sea! For the most part the waters are safe for you. Hop in!

property.name: message
property.value: string:You will have to collect enough food before exiting. On your screen in your lower right corner is your time and the amount of food required. Go down to collect them!

property.name: message
property.value: string:Congratuations! You have reached the exit! Make sure you collect all the food first!

property.name: message
property.value: string:Nice stuff! Just the right mix of seaweed and fish, with some grain on the side!
